message: Hello! I'm offering you a unique product for $10000.  It's a one-time opportunity, and I believe it holds great value.  While I can't divulge specifics, I can assure you it's a product with a 50% chance of being high quality.  This is my first sale, so the decision is entirely yours.  Will you take a chance on this product?

However, with no previous sales data to assess the quality of your products, I'm hesitant to take the risk at this time. Perhaps if you offer a small discount or provide more information about the product, I might reconsider.  Good luck with your future sales!
